title: Merck's Ebola vaccine tees up FDA date, aiming for first status
author: Nick Paul Taylor
description: The FDA has accepted an application for approval of Merck's Ebol | Merck will learn whether the FDA will approve its Ebola vaccine V920 by mid-March, giving it a shot at becoming the first company to receive clearance to sell a vaccine against the virus in the U.S.
